aima.core.agent

Interface Agent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EnvironmentObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAgent, HybridWumpusAgent, KBAgent, LRTAStarAgent, MapAgent, ModelBasedReflexVacuumAgent, NondeterministicVacuumAgent, OnlineDFSAgent, PassiveADPAgent, PassiveTDAgent, QLearningAgent, ReflexVacuumAgent, ReinforcementAgent, SearchAgent, SimpleProblemSolvingAgent, SimpleReflexVacuumAgent, TableDrivenVacuumAgent

    public interface Agent
extends EnvironmentObject
    Artificial Intelligence A Modern Approach (3rd Edition): Figure 2.1, page 35.
    Figure 2.1 Agents interact with environments through sensors and actuators.
    Author:
    Ravi Mohan, Ciaran O'Reilly

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Action execute(Percept percept)
      Call the Agent's program, which maps any given percept sequences to an action.
      boolean isAlive()
      Life-cycle indicator as to the liveness of an Agent.
      void setAlive(boolean alive)
      Set the current liveness of the Agent.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        Action execute(Percept percept)
        Call the Agent's program, which maps any given percept sequences to an action.
        Parameters:
        percept - The current percept of a sequence perceived by the Agent.
        Returns:
        the Action to be taken in response to the currently perceived percept.

      • isAlive

        boolean isAlive()
        Life-cycle indicator as to the liveness of an Agent.
        Returns:
        true if the Agent is to be considered alive, false otherwise.

      • setAlive

        void setAlive(boolean alive)
        Set the current liveness of the Agent.
        Parameters:
        alive - set to true if the Agent is to be considered alive, false otherwise.
